column4: hey i would have a question about taking off ubuntu and putting on xubuntu. the boot menu and how its done formatting off linix
good question but i usualy like to format
i don't just want to put the files on

Xubuntu and Ubuntu are the same linux distribution.  You just install xubuntu-desktop and remove ubuntu-desktop.  (Actually, theres a bit more than the remove ubuntu-desktop, but it's still easy as a single package manager line)
